title: How to write a lowercase b in cursive - Quora

response.answer_text: What I learned at German school in the 1970s was this:  and my “b” is almost like that, except that the little point on the right usually touches the loop. In secondary school I had two writing styles: I used “cursive” as above when writing longer texts, in German, French and English classes. For science I switched to “printed letters” and since I studied engineering and rarely wrote longer texts, though I kept the ability of writing cursive I don’t usually use that.
